unnormalised: But it's not just about fancy tech. Remember the Bollywood film 'Toilet: Ek Prem Katha'? It sparked a conversation about sanitation, and similarly, we need a swachh revolution when it comes to waste disposal.

unnormalised: Our cities are drowning in garbage - from the bustling streets of Mumbai to the serene ghats of Varanasi. Experts say we need better segregation at source. Imagine if every household diligently separated their dry waste from the wet.

unnormalised: Currently, around 80% of India's waste ends up in landfills, polluting our land and water. Think of all the methane gas released, contributing to climate change!
